sn12.82:1: At Sāvatthī. "Bhikkhus, one who does not know and see as it really is aging-and-death, its origin, its cessation, and the way leading to its cessation, should search for a teacher in order to know this as it really is.[n.27]Spk: Whether it be the Buddha or a disciple, the one in dependence upon whom one gains path knowledge is called a teacher (satthā,a word usually reserved for the Buddha); he should be sought for.sn.ii.3
